Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ma bian cao 馬鞭草 quoting Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 6: 馬喉痹 , “Throat blockage [as fast as a running] horse”, writes: 馬喉痹風 , “ Throat blockage wind [as fast as a running] horse ”.
